name: Date/period of application of forbearance measure derivation rule
description: This derivation rule aims to obtain the Date/period of application of forbearance measure from its building blocks.
algorithm:
SET APPLCTN_FRBRNC_STTS_DT = 
  CASE
    WHEN DT_FRBRNC_MSRS > DATEADD(month,-3,DT_RFRNC) 
    AND DT_FRBRNC_MSRS < DT_RFRNC
    THEN 2
    ELSE -1
  END;

logical_transformation_rule.algorithm:
SET BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_EIL.APPLCTN_FRBRNC_STTS_DT = 
      CASE
        WHEN BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_IL.DT_FRBRNC_MSRS > DATEADD(month,-3,BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_IL.DT_RFRNC) 
        AND BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_IL.DT_FRBRNC_MSRS < BIRD_INSTRMNT_RL_IL.DT_RFRNC
        THEN 2
        ELSE -1
      END;

SET BIRD_SCRTY_PSTN_EIL.APPLCTN_FRBRNC_STTS_DT = 
      CASE
        WHEN BIRD_SCRTY_PSTN_IL.DT_FRBRNC_MSRS > DATEADD(month,-3BIRD_SCRTY_PSTN_IL.DT_RFRNC) 
        AND BIRD_SCRTY_PSTN_IL.DT_FRBRNC_MSRS < BIRD_SCRTY_PSTN_IL.DT_RFRNC
        THEN 2
        ELSE -1
      END;
